name: Color Shooter (Crizchan)
description:
Color Shooter - Inspired by Color Switch

it is a Hyper casual game where the player need to destroy the block by shooting a laser with a correct color. if not he's color will set to random.

He must be careful to use all his bullet so he wont died out and careful to  let the bloc pass thru because its the law of this game.

This is my One month progress with Unity Engine and I'm Happy of it even it lacks something or its buggy . but I made this with a single sprite , No YouTube coz I memorize it all LMAO - Practice makes perfect I hope in other Month I will improve.

-Happy with the Journey of Game Dev

Controls

Left Mouse - Shoot
Number key 1 - change color to CYAN

Number key 2 - change color to RED

Number key 3 - change color to ORANGE

Number key 4 - change color to PINK

Mechanics - You should shoot the block by its correct color to Destroy it
Enjoy ? :)
